amendment.description: Amendment prioritizes foreclosure counseling services to areas of the country that have been the hardest-hit by the housing crisis.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-503 to prioritize foreclosure counseling services to areas of the country that have been the hardest-hit by the housing crisis.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cardoza.
